TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MissingSatelliteAssemblyException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 當預設文化特性之資源的附屬組件遺漏時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the satellite assembly for the resources of the default culture is missing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設文化特性為載入其資源的如果找不到適當的特定文化特性資源的文化特性。The default culture is the culture whose resources are loaded if the appropriate culture-specific resources cannot be found. 根據預設的預設文化特性的資源位於主要組件，與如果資源管理員會試著擷取，但找不到預設文化特性的資源，會擲回。By default, resources for the default culture are located in the main assembly, and a is thrown if the resource manager tries to retrieve but cannot find a resource for the default culture. 不過，.NET Framework 會載入應用程式的預設文化特性的資源的附屬組件從如果屬性指定的值位置參數。However, the .NET Framework will load the resources for an app's default culture from a satellite assembly if the attribute specifies a value of for the location parameter. 當這種情況時，資源管理員會嘗試擷取在指定的文化特性的附屬組件的預設文化特性的資源時，會擲回例外狀況遺漏的屬性。When this is the case, the exception is thrown when the resource manager tries to retrieve a resource of the default culture and the satellite assembly for the culture specified in the attribute is missing. 請注意，例外狀況擲回的資源擷取方法例如或，而不會在物件具現化。Note that the exception is thrown by a resource retrieval method such as or , and not when the object is instantiated. 會使用 HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY，0x80131536 的值。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_MISSINGSATELLITEASSEMBLY, which has the value 0x80131536. 使用預設的支援參考相等的實作。 uses the default implementation, which supports reference equality. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單類別，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructors. > [!NOTE] > 您應該一律使用屬性來定義您的應用程式的預設文化特性，以便在您的應用程式的特定文化特性的資源無法使用時，會顯示可接受的行為。You should always use the attribute to define your app's default culture so that if a resource for a specific culture is unavailable, your application will display acceptable behavior. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來指出英文是應用程式的預設文化特性和其資源會儲存在附屬組件。The following example uses the attribute to indicate that English is the app's default culture and that its resources are stored in a satellite assembly. 下表中所述，此範例本身會包含資源的英文和法文文化特性的.txt 檔案中：The example itself includes resources in .txt files for the English and French cultures, as described in the following table: |文化特性Culture|資源名稱/值Resource name/value|檔案名稱File name| |-------------|--------------------------|---------------| |英文English|Greet=HelloGreet=Hello|Greet.en.txtGreet.en.txt| |法文French|Greet=BonjourGreet=Bonjour|Greet.fr.txtGreet.fr.txt| 下列的原始程式碼建置的應用程式，法文 （法國） 和俄文 （俄羅斯），第一次變更的目前 UI 文化特性，並顯示適當的特定文化特性的資源，這兩種情況。The following source code builds an app that changes the current UI culture first to French (France) and then to Russian (Russia) and displays an appropriate culture-specific resource in both cases. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.missingsatelliteassemblyexception/cs/helloworld.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.MissingSatelliteAssemblyException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.missingsatelliteassemblyexception/vb/helloworld.vb#1)] 若要建置和執行範例的 C# 版本，您可以使用下列批次檔。You can use the following batch file to build and execute the C# version of the example. 如果使用 Visual Basic，請將 `csc` 取代成 `vbc`，並將 `.cs` 副檔名取代成 `.vb`。If you're using Visual Basic, replace `csc` with `vbc`, and replace the `.cs` extension with `.vb`. 執行範例時，顯示的法文語言字串，但會擲回目前文化特性是俄文 （俄羅斯） 時的例外狀況。When the example is executed, it displays a French language string but throws a exception when the current culture is Russian (Russia). 這是因為包含的預設文化特性資源的附屬組件 en\HelloWorld.dll 不存在。This is because the satellite assembly en\HelloWorld.dll that contains the resources of the default culture does not exist. ``` vbc HelloWorld.vb md fr resgen Greet.fr.txt al /out:fr\HelloWorld.resources.dll /culture:fr /embed:GreetResources.fr.resources HelloWorld ``` 若要建置和執行範例的 Visual Basic 版本，您可以使用下列批次檔。You can use the following batch file to build and execute the Visual Basic version of the example. 如果您使用 C#，取代`vbc`與`csc`，並取代`.vb`副檔名`.cs`。If you're using C#, replace `vbc` with `csc`, and replace the `.vb` extension with `.cs`. 執行範例時，它會顯示法文字串時的目前 UI 文化特性為法文 （法國）。When the example is executed, it displays a French language string when the current UI culture is French (France). 俄羅斯 （俄文） 的目前 UI 文化特性時，它會顯示英文語言字串因為俄文語言資源不存在，但是資源管理員就可以從附屬組件 en\HelloWorld2.dll 載入的預設文化特性的資源。When the current UI culture is Russia (Russian), it displays an English language string because Russian language resources do not exist, but the resource manager is able to load the resources of the default culture from the satellite assembly en\HelloWorld2.dll. ``` vbc HelloWorld.vb /out:HelloWorld2.exe md fr resgen GreetResources.fr.txt al /out:fr\HelloWorld2.resources.dll /culture:fr /embed:GreetResources.fr.resources md en resgen GreetResources.en.txt al /out:en\HelloWorld2.resources.dll /culture:en /embed:GreetResources.en.resources HelloWorld2 ```

summary.span: 從序列化資料中，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外狀況的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||內部例外狀況參考。The inner exception reference.| ||錯誤訊息字串。The error message string.|

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息和中性文化特性的名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and the name of a neutral culture.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CultureName As String
public: property System::String ^ CultureName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得預設文化特性的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the default culture.
The name of the default culture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式的預設文化特性由定義屬性。The app's default culture is defined by the attribute. 如需文化特性名稱的清單，請參閱[國家語言支援 (NLS) API 參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048)在 Go Global 開發人員中心。For a list of culture names, see the [National Language Support (NLS) API Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200048) at the Go Global Developer Center.
